user.title: IP PDU Setup
user.description: Enter the connection details for your IP Smart PDU.

data_description.voltage: Select your local grid voltage for accurate power (Watt) calculation. 230V: Europe, Australia, Asia, Africa. 220V: Parts of Europe/Asia. 240V: UK, Australia. 120V: USA, Canada, Mexico. 110V: Japan, Taiwan. 100V: Japan.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to PDU. Please check the IP address and credentials.
